name: You Are The Game
description:
You Are The Game The most expensive game you'll never buy

"You Are The Game" is a game you'll probably never buy.
This is the last gift.
Sadly, as with any gift you'll ever receive, it comes at a price.
It's a shame you'll never be able to play it.
But that's how things are.

This is Unknown Developer waving you goodbye.

Check the MD5 values to avoid piracy tampering:

"You Are The Game.exe" = 4A090961C311CC7EFCAD341D46BABCA2
"You Are The Game.wav" = 46FE24AFD555FD2E537B61E4C9ABBB36
"You Are The Game.flac" = 09CA83ED8C4AEE9CEE91BF02C34EF420
"You Are The Game.mp3" = 08F011B5E56E29BA31234487B6E80004

Tips & tricks

So, against all the odds, you got this game.
Now it's time to make it work.
Here's a couple of tips and tricks to get the most out of it.

Gameplay tips:

BE PATIENT - BE WAKEFUL

Reward tricks:

GET THE CODE - USE THE CODE

Addendum

Due to popular demand, an additional explanation on how to experience this game is therefore presented.

Knowing is a beautiful thing.
But learning requires time.
Time to be spent waiting.
Waiting for the horror to come.
At the end you'll be rewarded.
The reward is knowledge.
Because knowing is a beautiful thing.
